LanguageData.VFES_Turret_ChargeComplex.label: встановленний енергетичний кулемет
LanguageData.VFES_Turret_ChargeComplex.description: A stationary charge cannon mounted on a metal barrier. Capable of sustaining fire until the barrel needs changing.
LanguageData.VFES_Gun_ChargeComplex.label: charge gun emplacement
LanguageData.VFES_Gun_ChargeComplex.description: A charge gun made to be mounted on a turret.
LanguageData.VFES_Bullet_ChargeComplex.label: енергетичний постріл
